job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production.

   Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems.

   This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization, orchestrations, dev tool development, and distributed algorithms.

   We also have a great reputation in the industry building leading edge solutions for ML platforms.

   What You'll Do

     * Provide solutions for data curation pipelines.
     * Develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models.
     * As a core member of Michelangelo, work with team members in US to develop solutions for NLP and generative AI used by all ML engineers in Uber.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, focusing on the entire ML lifecycle including feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. While it mentions extending support to generative AI and large-scale models, the core focus remains on the platform and tools for ML engineers, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on building and maintaining production-grade systems for predictive models and MLOps. The mention of 'large scale models' and 'generative AI' in the context of extending existing ML platform capabilities, rather than building user-facing GenAI applications, leans towards the ML Engineer role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide solutions for data curation pipelines' directly relates to the management and preparation of data, which is a core aspect of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide solutions for data curation pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models' and 'developing solutions for NLP and generative AI' clearly indicate the creation, training, and deployment of various types of models, including generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: develop the platform for training / analyzing / serving large scale models, embedding, NLP models
